mapper.sql: cid, member_id, nation, marriage_status, member_type, age, birthday, address, live_status, money_source, salary, security_num, guarantee, disease, disability, deformity, degree, company, blood_type, cext1, cext2, cext3, iext1, iext2, dext1, dext2, native_place, district, politics_status, religion, professional_title, service_type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from member_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into member_info (cid, member_id, nation, marriage_status, member_type, age, birthday, address, live_status, money_source, salary, security_num, guarantee, disease, disability, deformity, degree, company, blood_type, cext1, cext2, cext3, iext1, iext2, dext1, dext2, native_place, district, politics_status, religion, professional_title, service_type) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moneySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deformity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iext1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iext2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dext1,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dext2,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{religion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{professionalTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update member_info set nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage_status = #{marriageStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, live_status = #{liveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money_source = #{moneySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, security_num = #{securityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guarantee = #{guarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disease = #{disease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disability = #{disability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deformity = #{deformity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, politics_status = #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, religion = #{religion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, professional_title = #{professionalTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_type = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
